languages.text: Орудие производит искаженные детали и механизмы, которые позволяют создать больше еретических устройств. Из-за источаемой Орудием скверны люди гниют заживо, а станкам и конвейерам требуется регулярный ремонт.

The Engine produces twisted parts and mechanisms to be used in the construction of other heretical devices. The Engine's corrupting presence causes people to rot alive and machinery and conveyor belts to require constant maintenance.
languages.original_text: Орудие производит искаженные детали и механизмы, которые позволяют создать больше еретических устройств. Из-за источаемой Орудием скверны люди гниют заживо, а станкам и конвейерам требуется регулярный ремонт.

traits.locale_text: The Engine produces twisted parts and mechanisms to be used in the construction of other heretical devices. The Engine's corrupting presence causes people to rot alive and machinery and conveyor belts to require constant maintenance.
The terrifying guard stalks the Rogue Trader's holdings, ensuring the inhabitants' obedience.

The Engine produces twisted parts and mechanisms to be used in the construction of other heretical devices. The Engine's corrupting presence causes people to rot alive and machinery and conveyor belts to require constant maintenance.

The Engine produces twisted parts and mechanisms to be used in the construction of other heretical devices. The Engine's corrupting presence causes people to rot alive and machinery and conveyor belts to require constant maintenance.

languages.text: La Machine produit des pièces et mécanismes contrefaits destinés à la fabrication d'autres appareils hérétiques. La présence corruptrice de la Machine fait pourrir les gens sur pied, et les mécanismes ainsi que les tapis roulants nécessitent une maintenance constante.
languages.original_text: The Engine produces twisted parts and mechanisms to be used in the construction of other heretical devices. The Engine's corrupting presence causes people to rot alive and machinery and conveyor belts to require constant maintenance.

traits.locale_text: La Machine produit des pièces et mécanismes contrefaits destinés à la fabrication d'autres appareils hérétiques. La présence corruptrice de la Machine fait pourrir les gens sur pied, et les mécanismes ainsi que les tapis roulants nécessitent une maintenance constante.

languages.text: エンジンは、他の異端装置の製造に使用される歪んだ部品やメカニズムを生産する。エンジンの腐敗した状態は、人々を生きたまま腐らせ、機械やベルトコンベアは絶え間ないメンテナンスを必要とする。
languages.original_text: The Engine produces twisted parts and mechanisms to be used in the construction of other heretical devices. The Engine's corrupting presence causes people to rot alive and machinery and conveyor belts to require constant maintenance.

traits.locale_text: エンジンは、他の異端装置の製造に使用される歪んだ部品やメカニズムを生産する。エンジンの腐敗した状態は、人々を生きたまま腐らせ、機械やベルトコンベアは絶え間ないメンテナンスを必要とする。

languages.text: 这台引擎生产出了扭曲的部件与机构，用来制造各种其他异端机械装置。由于引擎的存在，人们的身体不断溃烂，机器与传送带也需要不断维护。
languages.original_text: The Engine produces twisted parts and mechanisms to be used in the construction of other heretical devices. The Engine's corrupting presence causes people to rot alive and machinery and conveyor belts to require constant maintenance.

traits.locale_text: 这台引擎生产出了扭曲的部件与机构，用来制造各种其他异端机械装置。由于引擎的存在，人们的身体不断溃烂，机器与传送带也需要不断维护。

languages.text: El motor produce piezas y mecanismos retorcidos para construir otros ingenios herejes. La influencia corruptora del motor pudre en vida a la gente y hace que la maquinaria y las cintas transportadoras necesiten mantenimiento constante.
languages.original_text: The Engine produces twisted parts and mechanisms to be used in the construction of other heretical devices. The Engine's corrupting presence causes people to rot alive and machinery and conveyor belts to require constant maintenance.

traits.locale_text: El motor produce piezas y mecanismos retorcidos para construir otros ingenios herejes. La influencia corruptora del motor pudre en vida a la gente y hace que la maquinaria y las cintas transportadoras necesiten mantenimiento constante.

languages.text: Die Maschine produziert verzerrte Teile und Mechanismen, die für den Bau anderer ketzerischer Vorrichtungen genutzt werden. Die Verderbtheit der Maschine lässt Leute bei lebendigem Leib verwesen, Geräte und Fließbänder müssen unaufhörlich gewartet werden.
languages.original_text: The Engine produces twisted parts and mechanisms to be used in the construction of other heretical devices. The Engine's corrupting presence causes people to rot alive and machinery and conveyor belts to require constant maintenance.

traits.locale_text: Die Maschine produziert verzerrte Teile und Mechanismen, die für den Bau anderer ketzerischer Vorrichtungen genutzt werden. Die Verderbtheit der Maschine lässt Leute bei lebendigem Leib verwesen, Geräte und Fließbänder müssen unaufhörlich gewartet werden.

languages.text: Motor, diğer kâfir cihazlarının yapımında kullanılmak üzere çarpık parçalar ve mekanizmalar üretiyor. Motoru'un yozlaştırıcı varlığı; insanların diri diri çürümesine, makinelerin ve konveyör bantlarının ise sürekli bakım gerektirmesine neden oluyor.
languages.original_text: The Engine produces twisted parts and mechanisms to be used in the construction of other heretical devices. The Engine's corrupting presence causes people to rot alive and machinery and conveyor belts to require constant maintenance.
